column2: This mod has extensive debugging functionality, which should help you resolve any issues.

Debug mode for the "§YExpanded Decisions: Tributaries§!" mod is §Genabled§!.\nAdditional debug decisions are available via targeted and self-targeted decisions.\nOther notable effects: AI will §Yalways accept offers from administrators§! (single-player humans and MP hosts).
When you're finished debugging, you should probably disable debug mode.
Debug mode for the "§YExpanded Decisions: Tributaries§!" mod is §Rdisabled§!.\nAI behaviour will §Yreturn to normal§!.
Destroy all Protectorates where an AI character is the suzerain.
The third-party filter contains a list of all Protectorates in the world.
The third-party filter contains a list of all suzerains of Protectorates in the world.
Destroy all protectorates where [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is the suzerain.
Destroy the Protectorate relationship between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetHerHis] suzerain.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Protectorate of the selected human player.
